title: Boundaries of the site and, in a case where the site has been partitioned, boundaries of the portion
clause_text: Boundaries of the site and, in a case where the site has been partitioned, boundaries of the portions owned by others;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
